title: INVISIBLE
description: A sophisticated cocktail that contains cherry liqueur gin and herbal liqueur with hints of cocoa and coffee.

title: CREAM ON TOP
description: A cocktail based on mixed whiskey and tonka nut syrup that comes from South America with unique flavors of vanilla, pistachio and coffee served with red wine whipped cream and spices. A sweet and spicy cocktail with a delicate complexity accompanied by the flavors of sangria.

title: HEMINGWAY IN LONDON
description: A gin-based cocktail accompanied by grapefruit cordial and a special lemon concentration with a salt water compound. Citrus cocktail, sour, slightly herbaceous and salty.

title: COAL SUGAR
description: A beet-infused rum-based cocktail combined with Italian liqueur, almond syrup and passionfruit. A sour and citrusy cocktail with sweet carnivorous flavors.
